fb_msg.message:
The one when Weekend is SuperFUN!
#withBestPeople #MicrosoftInterns #RiverRafting #WenatcheeRiver

Recent Facebook 'pride' profile photo change trend just reminded me of the fact that there are so many nasty vast generalizations lying everywhere around us..

People accusing each other in a condescending way of changing the profile pic without knowing the reason behind it. Calling out on their hypocrisy in real life is understandable. But something as minor as a profile pic on a virtual medium, and making a big meal of everything is stupid. If people do something without knowing the reason behind it, then there is jack shit we can do to change their  
 tendency to find a reason before doing anything.

Live and let people, and stop judging each other on every occasion.
Navaho pass(hike):The kind of days when you realise that you're not as fit as you used to be, and are just happy to roll by until you can turn back time :D

First gettogether with our mini little social group at Microsoft. For all of the unaware onlookers lookie-lookie up pizookies, and spot it on the table :p

ps- A fair warning, pizookie is nothing so special but then what do we know :D

So after a long long, and another long while :p finally a movie came which keeps you totally glued to the screen, one and only our desi 'Dum laga ke haisha' :D Every frame with the background score knocks it well out of the park. Last time I had similar feelings about a desi movie was Udaan. Must see for anyone out there :)

Whenever you feel that you're about to crash & burn in studies and whatnot , then it's time!! Time to take the moral high road, and  make a check-list of  what else we're missing out there. Time to take a look at the bigger picture. Time to stare deep into the abyss. :D

Well then while we're still building our house of cards, reality strikes 'one more time', and we're back to the same old swansong again. :p

Hell yeah!! To whomsoever who said that I could write poetry if you can call some randomly assorted words as poetry. :D  Credits to a friend for being kind enough to lend me 4 of her lines to this poetry(in years) err rant :p

ps- Big prizes in store if any of you can guess which of the 4 lines were not mine :p Easy as cutting a butter with hot knife :p

The day divides the night; and night divides the day
Marks the return of the Gunslinger
Move aside all you racoon cum goons
A fiery reputation precedes the Man with no name
Mightiest of armies fallen apart with one gaze
Choking out a pride of lions with bare hands
Would the fables ever end?
Everybody just fell in line
There’s only one side to the mirror this time
Drum rolls, trumpet blow
Enters ‘the girl in Red dress’
Eyes don’t align
Footprints go sideways
But what the eff happened
The girl just entered
Love should have happened there & then
How can a sucker of a poet write so abruptly
That’s not what poets do
They have a magical flow to everything
Nonsense is okay
But something should make sense to interpret
Said ‘the pack’
What to do, What to do?
Truth be told,
There was no love to happen this time
Because ‘the girl in Red Dress’
Exited a long long time ago
After adding her own version to the fables
It’s not okay to burn
instead of fading away
She said;
Because you’ve still got your world around,
It’s still the same,
Nothing seems to have moved much.
Then what was it that just passed?
The Gunslinger did.
Another one bites the dust.
Dude..its time to change the cover pic ? ;-)
So sorry there are only one The Invincibles aka 2004 Arsenal Team....:)
